rejection.details:
You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council directly. Find out how to petition your council here: https://www.stoke.gov.uk/info/20043/councillors_and_decision-making/137/petitions

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to increase local authority funding for road maintenance, if that's something you want to happen.
